title: Because this will definitely balance Gangplank yeah? Come on dude.
body:
Gangplank
Base HP reduced to 580 from 631
HP per level growth increased to 82 from 79
Parrrley (Q) mana cost reduced to 40 from 50.
Parrrley (Q) no longer refunds 50% of mana cost (25 mana) on kill.

No power reduction to his Barrels AT ALL.

replies.body: Looks fine to me. His laning gets a big nerf, and his barrels aren't that hard to avoid anyway imo. Nerfing them would be stupid.

51 Base HP, 3 HP per level increase and a 15 mana cost to his Q is a huge nerf?

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/creepypasta/images/e/ee/Spongebob-imagination.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140908000844

Dat Vayne 3 AD nerf too.
Except now his early game is much weaker and he can't get as much gold to buy items, so technically it did reduce the power of his barrels, unless you feed him like a pleb.
His lane phase got a huge nerf.
